A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The good: Adds a lot to cannon (as respectfully as one could)\, twists the story of the saga in an interesting direction\, has a number of memorable moments\, continues the original trilogy tradition of making cinema references\, and has meaningful nostalgic moments.

The bad: Too many awkward jokes\, Finn's story line is superfluous\, many characters have disappointing and confusing story lines (Rey\, Kylo\, Leia\, Poe\, and especially Snoke)\, several elements from Ep. VIII seem disconnected from their implications in Ep. VII (Maz\, rebel alliance\, Snoke again).

Verdict: Left entertained by the phenomenal cinematography and acting but disappointed by the story\, writing\, and direction.
